briefdescription.para: Types of node in an SSC decoder.
LLR values for stage 0 (i.e., received LLRs).
Pointers to the upper half of the LLR values for all stages.
Pointers to the lower half of LLR values for all stages.

memberdef.argsstring: (span< uint8_t > data_decoded, span< const log_likelihood_ratio > input_llr, uint8_t code_size_log, span< const uint16_t > frozen_set)
memberdef.name: init

detaileddescription.para:
Initializes internal parameters and registers.
data_decoded
Register for writing the decoded data.
input_llr
Input codeblock as a sequence of log-likelihood ratios.
code_size_log
Codeblock size (binary logarithm thereof).
frozen_set
Indices of the frozen bits.
All decoded bits below a RATE_0 node are 0. The function updates the p->state->active_node_per_stage pointer to point to the next active node. It is assumed that message bits are initialized to 0.
RATE_1 nodes at stage $ s $ return the associated $2^s$ estimated bits by making a hard decision on them. RATE_1 nodes also update message bits vector.
RATE_R nodes at stage $ s $ return the associated $2^s$ decoded bit by calling the child nodes to the right and left of the decoding tree and then polar encoding (xor) their output.
Switches between the different types of node for the SSC algorithm. Nodes in the decoding tree at stage $ s$ get the $2^s$ LLRs from the parent node and return the associated $2^s$ estimated bits.
Initializes all the polar decoder variables according to the Simplified Successive Cancellation (SSC) decoder algorithm and the maximum given code size.

parameterdescription.para: The $ log_2$ of the number of bits of the decoder input/output vector.

simplesect.para: A unique pointer to the initialized SSC polar decoder.

memberdef.argsstring: (span< uint8_t > data_decoded, span< const log_likelihood_ratio > input_llr, const polar_code &code) override
memberdef.name: decode

briefdescription.para: Decodes the input (LLR) codeword with the specified polar decoder.

detaileddescription.para: Generic polar decoder according to the specifications of TS38.212 Section 5.3.1.
